players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Oh no, Bob is dead! I was hoping to hear from him today."
Charlie: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
You: "Charlie's investigation seems credible, but let's gather more information before jumping to conclusions. I will talk to Bob's neighbors and see if they have any insights."
Charlie: "I trust my investigation. Diana is mafia. We should vote her out immediately."
Diana: "I am the detective! I investigated Charlie last night and he is mafia. He's trying to frame me to save himself."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
